modName: Shield of Ysgramor Upgradable and Enchantable
summary: Changed the Shield, Made sure it can be upgraded fully and removed the enchantment so you can add your own.
descriptionHtml:
Good Shield, Biggest in the game as far as I\'m aware.
The only thing, can\'t be upgraded properly! The smithing perks do not effect it.

I changed that so it can now be upgraded properly with the steel smithing perk and I also removed the enchant.
I just prefer to use my own enchantment.

I left the defence at 30 base. This is still a pretty solid number and the shield itself is massive so it provides a good defence against projectiles.
author: poonfizz22
